thread.section_title: Ibis Styles Paris Lafayette Opera - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: very noisy and small
thread.title_full: very noisy and small - Review of Ibis Styles Paris Lafayette Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alireza B
title: very noisy and small
text:
We entered to hotel January 15. The rooms are small but includes are necessary. Staff are friendly with guests. The most important advantage is location. Very close to grands boulevard station and close to hussmann boulevard, Lafayette, opera.
Lots of caf√©, restaurants around you can enjoy evenings. There is a very big shopping center (galleries Lafayette haussmann) ten minutes west including lots of famous brands.
